about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: With over 20 years of experience, we serve as one of Turkey's leading dental health organizations.
about.description: Learn about our history, mission, vision and values that make us a leader in dental health.
about.keywords: about us, hospitadent, dental clinic, dental health, turkey

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.text: To be the closest and most innovative oral and dental health brand to the world's patients.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.text: To add value to people, society and the environment with high service quality; to give confidence by treating each of our patients like our own relatives in an ethical, sincere and empathetic manner, to reach more people with balanced physical growth, to follow technological and scientific developments and apply them in a pioneering manner, to make people happy by designing aesthetic smiles with smile architects.

value1.title: We Value:
value1.text: We are aware of the value of human beings, life and the world.

value2.title: We Care:
value2.text: We care for our patients like our relatives and guests we host at home.

value3.title: We Give Trust:
value3.text: Everyone who comes into contact with us (our patients, suppliers, environment, etc.) is sure that we try to do our best and the right thing, and that we are bound by ethical rules. We only do what we say and only say what we will do.

value4.title: We Are Sincere and Close:
value4.text: We show balanced sincerity and closeness to everyone.

value5.title: We Feel Responsible:
value5.text: We feel responsible towards people, society, the environment, that is, the entire universe.

value6.title: We Are Innovative:
value6.text: We are always curious and willing about innovations and developments.

value7.title: We Value Quality:
value7.text: The best materials, the newest technology and high hygiene are indispensable for us.

value8.title: We Collaborate:
value8.text: We look after the interests of our patients and suppliers by collaborating with them, and in the team, we think that if one of us is missing, we are all missing.

value9.title: We Want to Give Happiness:
value9.text: We think that true happiness is the happiness of others and strive for it.

history.text1: Founded in 2006, Hospitadent continues to serve with the slogan "From day one, all our business is teeth". With its 22 branches established domestically and internationally, modern medical devices, distinguished physician staff and expert personnel, Hospitadent raises standards in oral and dental health.

branches.title: High Service Quality in Every Branch
branches.text1: Following the first center opened in Bağcılar, Hospitadent, which expanded to Fatih in 2008, Çamlıca in 2009, Pendik and Mecidiyeköy in 2011, opened its first international branch in Frankfurt, Germany in 2012. The hospital group, which increased the number of branches with a new center opened in Bakırköy, opened Ankara branch, Kocaeli branch, Antalya branch, Cevizlibağ branch in Istanbul and finally Bursa branch in 2014 in Kayseri, 2015 in The Hague, Netherlands, 2018 in Şerifali, 2021 in Alanya and Bodrum and 2022. Hospitadent continues to grow with confident steps with many branches in 4 different countries.
branches.text2: In addition to the rapidly increasing number of branches, Hospitadent Academy was established in 2008 for the continuous education of expert physicians and technical personnel on professional development and technological innovations.
branches.text3: Hospitadent is a pioneering name that sets standards in the health sector with its innovative projects. The hospital, which started the Dent Guard loyalty program in 2016, created a guaranteed dental treatment system with personalized cards and advantages. In the Dental Design department established in 2017, digital smile design was started. Hospitadent, which offers superior technological infrastructure in each of its branches, serves its patients with an individual and long-lasting dental treatment approach.

innovations.title: Hospitadent, Address of Firsts
innovations.text: Hospitadent, which started dental health tourism for the first time in Turkey in 2007, has become the sought-after address for dental treatment by patients from all over the world. Hospitadent, which achieved a first in the health sector and established the Patient Experience Department for the first time in Turkey, attaches great importance to patient experience and satisfaction. With this understanding, the hospital, which created a special concept called Dental Spa in 2016, aims to end the fear of dentists with its VIP concept that provides patients with a relaxing environment and psychological support.

awards.title: Success Story Crowned with Awards
awards.text1: Hospitadent's world-standard vision, expert personnel, innovative and customer satisfaction-oriented work were certified with awards. Hospitadent, which proved that it was the people's choice by serving more than 1 million patients by 2010, won the TEMOS International Quality Certificate in 2013.
awards.text2: In 2015, it was deemed worthy of the Health Institution of the Year award as a result of the Ekovitrin Magazine 14th Stars of the Year Survey.
awards.text3: Hospitadent became the first hospital in Turkey to win a Stevie Award by winning the Most Innovative Customer Service Award of the Year at the Stevie Awards, where the world's most successful companies are awarded in 2018.
awards.text4: Hospitadent, which ranked first in the Dental Treatment Services category in the Turkey Exporters Assembly's Turkey's 500 Service Exporters research in 2018, proved its success and competence in the health sector once again.
awards.text5: Hospitadent, which qualified to enter the "Turquality Brand Support Program" created in 2020 for the purpose of branding Turkish products abroad, establishing and supporting the Turkish goods image, which has been in force for 16 years, continues to create a positive image by taking an important step in branding. Being the first dental health group to participate in the Turquality brand support program, in which only five hospitals are involved in the health field, demonstrates high standards as well as creating a quality image.
awards.text6: Hospitadent, which qualified to be called a "Great Place To Work® Certified" company as a result of the evaluation and analysis conducted by GPTW Turkey in the last period of 2021, is experiencing the rightful pride of being the first dental group to have the best corporate culture certificate.

about.conclusion: Hospitadent, which continuously follows developing medical technologies and continuously advances diagnosis and treatment methods with the most current technologies, continues to provide safe and quality health service with its expert staff.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Current information about dental health and treatment methods
blog.pageDescription: Dental health, treatment methods and current dentistry information. Tips and advice from our expert dentists.
blog.pageKeywords: dental health blog, dental treatment information, dentistry articles, oral health, dental care

post1.title: Importance of Daily Dental Care
post1.excerpt: Learn how your daily care routine should be for healthy teeth.
post1.content: Daily dental care is the foundation of oral health. You can prevent dental problems with proper brushing techniques, flossing, and regular checkups.
post1.author: Dr. Ahmet Yılmaz

post2.title: Orthodontic Treatment Process
post2.excerpt: What happens during orthodontic treatment and what path is followed?
post2.content: Orthodontic treatment is a long-term process applied to properly align teeth. Patient compliance is very important in this process.
post2.author: Dr. Ayşe Demir

post3.title: What You Need to Know About Implant Treatment
post3.excerpt: How is implant treatment performed and who can it be applied to?
post3.content: Implant treatment is a modern treatment method that offers permanent solutions to replace missing teeth. Detailed information about the surgical process and aftermath.
post3.author: Dr. Mehmet Kaya

post4.title: Smile Design and Cosmetic Dentistry
post4.excerpt: Cosmetic dentistry solutions for perfect smile.
post4.content: Smile design is a comprehensive treatment plan that improves the aesthetic appearance of teeth according to the person's facial structure.
post4.author: Dr. Fatma Özkan

post5.title: Dental Health in Children
post5.excerpt: What parents need to know for their children's dental health.
post5.content: Dental health in children is ensured through regular care and checkups from an early age. The role of parents is very important.
post5.author: Dr. Ali Çelik

post6.title: Digital Dentistry Technologies
post6.excerpt: Digital technologies used in modern dentistry.
post6.content: Digital dentistry offers innovative technologies that speed up treatment processes and increase patient comfort.
post6.author: Dr. Zeynep Arslan
